name: Christmas Cookie Crisis
description:
Santa was working in the kitchen to speed up cookie production- and decided to make cookies build cookies. 

Gingerbread men run amok! But don't stop them, build them up! All Santa needs is to grow the population to over 25! But he can't directly control them, instead manipulate the environment of the kitchen, so the gingerbread can find their own way.

Controls:

Arrows to move Santa, Z button to lick up frosting and crumbs to restore stamina.

Made by

Peter Sheehan

Felipe Vega

Sheenu You
